name: Leavesrot
description: A large ooze resembling an ordinary pile of leaves, capable of blending into its environment.
memorable: Its ability to surprise with toxic spores and deceptive appearance makes it a dangerous foe.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and use poison to control the battlefield.
relations: May be found in areas dense with foliage, often alone or in small groups.
environment: Typically inhabits forests or overgrown areas, camouflaging among the leaves.
strengths: Resilient with high hit points, damage immunities, and abilities to poison and grapple opponents.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and poor Dexterity make it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a Pseudopod attack that deals bludgeoning and acid damage while grappling its target.
most_powerful_ability: Release Spores can affect multiple creatures, dealing poison damage and imposing the choking condition.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even while blind.
skills: Has a low proficiency in perception, with a passive score of 9.
additional_information: Damage immunities include acid, bludgeoning, and cold.
Condition immunities make it durable against various debilitating effects.
Can move through narrow spaces without squeezing due to its Amorphous ability.
False Appearance ability allows it to camouflage as leaves until it strikes.
Ooze Nature allows it to function without needing sleep.
test_queries: toxic creature that gives poison damage
creature with high HP and low AC
